Posts.Content: Jul 17, 2012 05:50PM Dianadawn wrote: I was relieved to find my BRAC test negative. This was the ultimate deciding point for me to have a lumpectomy. I'm two weeks out from the lumpectomy and SND. The SND site is giving me more problems than the lumpectomy site. :-) I agree with a lot of the suggestions made. Good luck! It is a scary journey but you never have to be alone in it.
Posts.Title: Is choosing a lumpectomy a mistake? christina0001 lane4
